title: Do We Live In A Computer Simulation? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/26/19
itunes:title: Do We Live In A Computer Simulation? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/26/19
description:
George Noory and MIT computer scientist and video game designer Riz Virk explore the theory that human reality is actually a computer simulation like the movie "The Matrix," and whether the religious notion of God is the computer programmer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
